data.title: Coffee review
data.text:
Weak, bitter, too hot & expensive. Overrated and unfortunately Starbucks has monopolised the market giving people a very bad representation of what espresso coffee should be like. 
The iced coffee we tried was over sweetened making almost u drinkable

data.title: A Big Thank You
data.text:
This is to all the Starbucks that I have visited from Idaho Springs to Beaver Creek in Colorado to Kayenta in Arizona to Las Vegas in Nevada to Los Angeles in California 
I have enjoyed your Cafe Lattes and cold brewed ice coffees
.. So grateful that I was able to enjoy full flavored coffee during my stay in America

data.title: Como qualquer outro
data.text: Não vi nenhuma diferença entre este e os demais da rede. Mas como adoro a companhia, isso foi bom para mim. Bom atendimento.
